definition[0]: someone who spends too much time studying and seems to have no other interests â€“ used to show disapproval
definition[1]: to study a lot in a short time, especially for an examination
definition[2]: a system for examining the way a company is run or the way someone works, in order to see what the good and bad features are
definition[3]: strengths, weaknesses, opportunities, threats; a system for examining a business plan, the way a company is run etc, to see what the good and bad points are
example[2]: Before producing a business development plan, it may be helpful to carry out aSWOT analysis.
